attributes.action: Posthumously recognise Harry Patch as a National Hero and award him a Posthumous Knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Harry Patch was the last British survivor of the First World War, the sacrifice he and his friends made over 90 years ago should not be forgotten and Mr Patch should be declared a national hero and awarded a Posthumous Knighthood to recognise his service and sacrifice for his country

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
